all_questions: Which of the following is an effective technique for managing nervousness during a speech?
What is the recommended way to engage the audience during a speech?
Why is it important to rehearse a speech before delivering it?
all_options: Avoid eye contact with the audience
Take deep breaths and practice relaxation techniques
Speak rapidly to get through the speech quickly
Use complex vocabulary and technical terms
Avoid making eye contact with the audience
Speak softly and without much variation in tone
Rehearsing helps build suspense for the audience
Rehearsing allows for improvisation and spontaneity
Rehearsing helps improve the speaker's confidence and delivery
